DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study measure coefficient friction three silicone hydrogel , daily disposable contact lenses 16 hour wear .
DOC.detailed_description: In 3-treatment , 3-period , 6-sequence crossover study , participant wear 3 product randomize order , 1 product time , washout period 7 day treatment period . Lenses collect ex-vivo lubricity analysis . The ex-vivo lubricity analysis conduct separate non-clinical protocol .
DOC.criteria: Must sign inform consent form . Soft contact lens wearer ( eye ) . Willing wear study lenses least 16 waking hour attend study visit . Other protocolspecified inclusion criterion may apply . Ocular anterior segment infection , inflammation , abnormality , active disease would contraindicate contact lens wear . Use systemic ocular medication contact lens wear could contraindicate . Use artificial tear rewetting drop study . Monocular ( 1 eye functional vision ) fit 1 lens . History herpetic keratitis , ocular surgery , irregular cornea . Pregnant . Other protocolspecified exclusion criterion may apply .
